fields.label: Font size
fields.name: fontsize
fields.description: Font size in points

fields.label: Scale
fields.name: scale
fields.description: Scale factor for non-font objects

fields.label: Resolution
fields.name: resolution
fields.description: Scale factor for all objects

fields.label: Margin
fields.name: margin
fields.description: Margin size

fields.label: Pseudo-latex syntax
fields.name: extsyntax
fields.description: Extended syntax for strings by using latex-like notation for math formulas such as: subscript _{...}, superscirpt ^{...}, "italic" $a$, \a is \alpha, \b is \beta, etc.

fields.label: Show tree label
fields.name: showtreename
fields.description: If set to False treename (if present) will be not visible.

fields.label: Use branch length
fields.name: uselength
fields.description: Draw by using branch lengths present in tree string, e.g. (a:10.5,b:3):5. To ignore branch lengths defined in a tree set <uselength=0>.

fields.label: Tree style id
fields.name: treestyle
fields.description: Tree drawing style: 1 - simple trees; 2 - phylograms.

fields.label: Edge width
fields.name: lw
fields.description: Line width for the edges of trees.

fields.label: Leaf x-distance
fields.name: leafdelta
fields.description: The smallest x-distance between two neighbouring leaves in rooted trees

fields.label: Rooting edge length
fields.name: rootedgelen
fields.description: The branch length for the root edge; used if uselength=False or the length is undefined in the tree.

fields.label: Leaves rotation
fields.name: rotateleaves
fields.description: Leaf rotation in degrees. It is set autmatically to 90 degrees if labels are long.

fields.label: Insert time legend
fields.name: timelegend
fields.description: Add time legend to a tree picture.

fields.label: Shape width
fields.name: shapewidth
fields.description: The minimum species tree edges width.

fields.label: Embedding style
fields.name: embedstyle
fields.description: Style for the drawing of embeddings. Available types 0 and 1.

fields.label: Draw pants
fields.name: pants
fields.description: Draw species tree shape with additional break determined by breaklevel variable.

fields.label: Draw phylogram
fields.name: embphylogram
fields.description: Draw gene tree inside a species tree by using phylogram style.

fields.label: Break level
fields.name: breaklevel
fields.description: The level of the break for the pants style of species tree (used when <pants=True>).

fields.label: Non-lost width
fields.name: emblw
fields.description: Line width of non-lost gene lineages.

fields.label: Lost width
fields.name: emblosslw
fields.description: Line width of lost gene lineages. Set to 0 to ignore lost lineages.

fields.label: Duplication level
fields.name: embduplevel
fields.description: The level of duplications [0,1]. The lower value the closer the duplication to its bottom speciation level.

fields.label: Proportional leaves
fields.name: leavesprop
fields.description: The width of leaves in tree shape will be proportional to the number of gene lineages (used only when embedstyle is 1).

fields.label: Map leaves
fields.name: mapleaves
fields.description: Draw mapping of leaves

fields.label: Map internal nodes
fields.name: mapinternal
fields.description: Draw mapping of internal nodes

fields.label: Distance between trees
fields.name: mapsep
fields.description: Separating distance between a gene tree and a species tree

fields.label: Crval
fields.name: crval
fields.description: Parameters for the mapping curves

fields.label: Crbe
fields.name: crbe
fields.description: Parameters for the mapping curves

fields.label: Embeddings
fields.name: embeddings
fields.description: Draw embeddings (default) or H-trees.

fields.label: Name style
fields.name: treenamestyle
fields.description: the style of tree names; 0 - double indexing in the form ’row.column’, the top row is 0; 1 - single indexing 0,1,2,. . . that starts from the top tree; 2 - double indexing where the top tree is indexed with ’f’ (fat tree) and the bottom tree (normal form) is indexed with ’*’; 3 - no tree numbers

fields.label: Name prefix
fields.name: treenameprefix
fields.description: The prefix for embedding treenames.

fields.label: Row distance
fields.name: rowsep
fields.description: defines the vertical space between each element in a row

fields.label: Column distance
fields.name: colsep
fields.description: defines the horizontal space between rows
